result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ
result.translation: (49) Who fear their Lord unseen,[889] while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
result.footnotes: [889]- Which can mean "Him being unseen" by them or "though they are unseen" by others.
